person.persName: John B. Stivers (Bourbon County, KY, carpenter and 2nd lieut 7th Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, carpenter and soldier. Clay County, Kentucky, native. Served in the 3rd Regiment of Kentucky Volunteer Infantry during the U.S.-Mexican War. Member of the Masonic order. Carpenter in Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant from August 19, 1861, to August 2, 1863.
